title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement parmartsam@gmail.com. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired [Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder][https://github.com/mozilla/inclusion]. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Get latest data

what: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset
title: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset
text: Use R access Washington Post School Shootings dataset. Provides convenient functions spend less time data wrangling time generating findings.

title: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset
text: can install development version waposchosh GitHub :

title: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset
text: basic example shows interact dataset: can use latest_data() get latest dataset Washington Post Github repo.

title: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset
text: Note repo scheduled update package data monthly basis. However, require reinstall pull latest processed data (.rda) file. alternative, latest_data() function pull current public dataset Washington Post.

title: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset
text: Credit goes Washington Post research reporting/database development team compiling sharing dataset Github repo.

title: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset
text: dataset originally still published Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC -NC-SA 4.0) license. dataset package slightly cleaned provided R data file format.

title: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset
text: Please note waposchosh project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

what: Washington Post School Shooting Raw Dataset — schoolshootings
title: Washington Post School Shooting Raw Dataset — schoolshootings
text: Washington Post compiling database every every act gunfire primary secondary school school hours since Columbine High massacre April 20, 1999

title: Washington Post School Shooting Raw Dataset — schoolshootings
Washington Post School Shooting Raw Dataset — schoolshootings
text: data frame 50 variables: uid double Unique identifier nces_school_id character National Center Education Statistics unique school ID school_name character Name school nces_district_id character National Center Education Statistics unique district ID district_name character Name school district date double Date shooting school_year character School year shooting year double Year shooting time double Approximate time shooting day_of_week character Day week shooting city character City school located state character State school located school_type character Type school (public private) enrollment double Enrollment school time shooting killed double Number killed shooting (excludes shooter) injured double Number injured shooting (excludes shooter) casualties double Number killed injured shooting (excludes shooter) shooting_type character Type shooting age_shooter1 double Age first shooter gender_shooter1 character Gender first shooter race_ethnicity_shooter1 character Race ethnicity first shooter shooter_relationship1 character First shooter's relationship school shooter_deceased1 double Flag indicating whether first shooter died shooting deceased_notes1 character first shooter deceased, first shooter died age_shooter2 double Age second shooter gender_shooter2 character Gender second shooter race_ethnicity_shooter2 character Race ethnicity second shooter shooter_relationship2 character Second shooter's relationship school shooter_deceased2 double Flag indicating whether second shooter died shooting deceased_notes2 character second shooter deceased, first shooter died white double Enrollment white students time shooting black double Enrollment black students time shooting hispanic double Enrollment Hispanic students time shooting asian double Enrollment Asian students time shooting american_indian_alaska_native double Enrollment American Indian Alaskan native students time shooting hawaiian_native_pacific_islander double Enrollment Hawaiian native Pacific islander students time shooting (unavailable prior 2009) two_or_more double Enrollment students two races time shooting (unavailable prior 2009) resource_officer double Flag indicating presence school resource officer security guard school grounds time shooting weapon character Weapon(s) used shooting weapon_source character shooter acquired weapon(s) used shooting lat double Latitude school long double Longitude school staffing double Full-time equivalent teachers school time shooting low_grade character Lowest grade-level offered school high_grade character Highest grade-level offered time shooting lunch double Number students school eligible receive free reduced-price lunch county character County name school located state_fips character Two-digit state Federal Information Processing Standards code county_fips character Five-digit county Federal Information Processing Standards code ulocale double National Center Education Statistics urban-centric locale code

title: Washington Post School Shooting Raw Dataset — schoolshootings
text: https://github.com/washingtonpost/data-school-shootings/

what: waposchosh: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset — waposchosh-package
title: waposchosh: R package containing Washington Post's school shooting dataset — waposchosh-package
text: Provides Washington Post Police Shootings dataset. Data source: Washington Post Github https://github.com/washingtonpost/data-school-shootings.
